items.sentence: Did Tom say he thought it would be hard to do that?
Tom told me that he didn't want to do that anymore.
Why do you think Tom enjoys climbing trees so much?
Tom's speech wasn't as boring as Mary's speech was.
Tom's friends shouted for Tom to come out and play.
I don't think that doing it that way would be fair.
Tom told me to look him up if I ever get to Boston.
Let's hope the same thing doesn't happen this year.
I can't believe you'd do something like that to me.
I didn't want to make a scene in front of everyone.
I had to leave the car in the middle of the street.
I promise you that you'll get a raise after a year.
I found this book interesting from start to finish.
I went on sleeping because the alarm didn't go off.
I went to the inspector's office for the documents.
I usually have a ham and cheese sandwich for lunch.
I happened to witness the bullying in the corridor.
Tom slowly opened the gift that Mary had given him.
They radioed us to say that they were under attack.
How were you able to afford to buy a car like this?
